exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 u : nat Unable to unify "p <> 0" with "0 < u".

exceptions.tactic: assert (H2: (exists q, u = q*p + 0)) by apply div_rem_spec1 with (q:=u) (p:=p).
exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 u : nat Unable to unify "u = div u p * p + rem u p" with "exists q : nat, u = q * p + 0".
The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.

original: assert (H1: (u <> 0)). - apply Nat.neq_0_lt_0. apply Hp. assert (H2: (exists q, u = q*p + 0)) by apply div_rem_spec1 with (q:=u) (p:=p). destruct H2 as [q [r [H3 H4]]]. rewrite rem_lt with (q:=u) (p:=p) in H4. rewrite rem_plus in H4. rewrite rem_diag in H4. assert (H5: (u mod p = 0)) by auto. apply Nat.mod_divide; auto.
